programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Another German joins the roster this week. One robot becomes an eviction technician, removing their opponents from the arena. Refbot joins the fray as he helps pit an immobilised robot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Four winners of the heats face each other in two eliminators, a play-off and a final battle between the two remaining robots. Only the most ferocious robot will be able to call themselves, the New Blood Champions.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A champion will emerge for each weight class battling in this Robot Rampage. Including Antweight, Middleweight, Lightweight and Featherweight.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A battle for one of the most prized robot wars possessions, the challenge belt. Challengers must defeat each other and take on the current holders, Tornado, if they are to claim it for themselves.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The ladies take over in this episode. Wives, girlfriends, mothers and sisters pilot the robots for this event. Battling through two rounds and a final, one robot will be crowned Iron Maiden Champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots, each representing a different university or college enter the arena. The house robots are have prepared a very valuable lecture for their new class.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robots from Australia, Cyprus, Scotland, England, South Africa, Wales, Canada and Northern Ireland battle in the arena to prove who is the best mechanical combatant in the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight robots from seven different countries battle each other for the title European Champions, including the reigning World Champions and the UK Champions. Will they be able to add another championship title to their collection?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first of sixteen Heats in the seventh series. The four-way melees kick off the competition with true carnage. Sir Killalot may have changed the tide of battle during the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The second round of heats sees eight new robots join the fight for The Seventh Wars title. Growler is de-muzzled as he rampages through the arena in the four-way melees, no-one is safe.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: After the four-way melees, the house robots do not hesitate to get involved with the remaining competitors. A counter-attack leads to one of the shortest finals robot wars has ever seen.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An equal number of newcomers and veterans take to the battlefield in this episode, experience versus vigor in todayâ€™s heats. The innocent Refbot gets attacked after cease is called.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Sixth Wars champions return to the arena to battle for the Seventh Wars title. Do they still have what it takes to win, or will the competition be too fierce this time round?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A newcomer from Germany joins the UK competitors in this weekâ€™s heats. Will they put show the UK how itâ€™s done, or will the other robots have a home advantage?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Another German joins the roster this week. One robot becomes an eviction technician, removing their opponents from the arena. Refbot joins the fray as he helps pit an immobilised robot.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A robot representing the Netherlands fights with the Brits in this heat. After attempting to attack one of the house robots, Growler makes an example of one of the competitors. Matilda uses her flywheel in spectacular fashion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One hapless robot gets expertly dismantled by another competitor, leaving Refbot to count them out. Maybe the house robots should take notes. A Hail Mary charge leaves yet another robot out of the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Seventh Wars continues, eight more robots with high hopes of becoming champion enter the arena. One robot has to see a man about a dog, as Mr. Psycho and Growler team up on a competitor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Four UK robots versus four R.O.W robots, the World Series victor will be decided by points, over a two episode tournament. Fighting for glory and country, the pressure is on. Will the competitors do their compatriots proud?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The wars wage on, with Team UK dominating this stage of the competition, will the home-ground advantage keep them on form, or will Team R.O.W cause a spectacular upset?

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.
